title: NLP Research Engineer (Assessment Scoring)

title: Scientific Software Engineer (Computational Physics)
description: Build and optimize Monte Carlo/Langevin simulators for materials; accelerate parameter sweeps and document results for interdisciplinary users.

title: Backend Engineer (Python/FastAPI)

title: EdTech Data Scientist (NLP)

title: Scientific Computing Advocate / Technical Writer

title: Research Engineer, Physics-Inspired ML

title: Orthopedic Surgeon
description: Perform surgical procedures and manage postoperative care; requires medical degree, residency, and board certification.

title: Senior Tax Accountant
description: Own corporate tax compliance and audits; CPA with deep GAAP/IFRS expertise required.

title: Commercial Airline Pilot
description: Operate commercial aircraft on domestic routes; requires FAA ATP, type ratings, and logged flight hours.

title: Pediatric Nurse (RN)
description: Provide nursing care to pediatric patients; active RN license and clinical experience required.

title: Real Estate Agent
description: Represent buyers/sellers in residential transactions; requires state real-estate license and MLS experience.

title: Sous Chef (Fine Dining)
description: Lead dinner service and develop menus in a fine-dining kitchen; culinary certification preferred.
